text: Helen Flint (January 14, 1898 – September 9, 1967) was an American actress. Wnile she appeared in over 20 films between 1931 and 1944, her career on Broadway with over 20 productions between 1921 and 1946 was even longer.https://www.ibdb.com/broadway-cast-staff/helen-flint-40718 In Hollywood, Flint often played seedy or sexually available womans. Among her better-known film roles are Ah, Wilderness! and Black Legion, she also portrayed the fortune-hunting actress Minna Tipton in David O. Selznick's production of Little Lord Fauntleroy.
